column4: Where is the best place to get help with routers/ making my computer accessible from the outside of my lan
That's the best advise, take it or leave it.
graingert synlinks are the way to go.
... use as many as you like.  It is easy.
Are you using DHCP to connect to your LAN?
as Jordan_U suggests, you should edit IP configuration via nm-connection-editor
Did you set up the router with nameserver(s) suggested by your ISP?  If so, try pinging one of them.
I have comcrap. It is one of the "automatic" isps
as Jordan_U suggests, you should edit IP configuration via nm-connection-editor and use 8.8.8.8 as nameserver
See what your are using now.  (grep nameserver /etc/resolv.conf)
